item.title: The Solution to the Arrow of Time
Our Universe is Designed by Minds
item.description: Ogi Ogas on : Our physical universe was designed for us. But not by a God.

item.title: Good Reply Game Workshop
item.description: A class that teaches you how to get the attention of notable people, through public correspondence (tweet replies/comments/essays). You pay only if it works This is win win because, you only pay if it works, AND when it works, it doubles as good marketing for the class.

it‚Äôs so beautiful watching people speedrunning the thought process that lead to ORI I have a question. When something new is discovered in biology/medicine/illness who is responsible for informing doctors of these new findings? x.com/Emma40025133/status/1928231848775217584 Shane‚Äôs response to my comment here: we‚Äôre not ready yet, but I‚Äôm betting on levin + wolfram + blaise aguera making this legible to the massive (they‚Äôre already making the concrete claim that maybe there exists intelligence at greater scales than humanity) x.com/DefenderOfBasic/status/1929216219988557828 His response: www.youtube.com/watch he agrees we‚Äôre not ready yet ‚Äúthey are interdimensional, but you don‚Äôt have to accept that, we can talk about them within our dimension‚Äù ‚Äúall we can do is paint a shape with our language‚Äù ‚Äútime isn‚Äôt as we understand it‚Äù .

item.title: Children can be better at epistemology than adults
item.description: It has a fancy name, but it‚Äôs really not that complicated. It‚Äôs just literally asking ‚Äúhow do we know that?‚Äù for each thing you learn. Example: dinosaurs Q1: How do we know they existed? A: We found these giant bones.

item.title: Epistemic Literacy Tests
item.description: A population may appear informed if they know a lot of things, but may be epistemically illiterate (cannot discern truth on their own). There is no way to know someone‚Äôs epistemic literacy from a snapshot, you must observe them gaining new knowledge.

item.title: Cognitive Lightcone
item.description: Doug hofstader our boy Michael Levin is out there describing IQ tests for cells! ‚ÄúCognitive light cone‚Äù. All very empirical, no woo woo required x.com/DefenderOfBasic/status/1810806770723336335 .

item.title: Human Superorganism is a Baby
item.description: A human mind is a collection of cells. A civilizational mind is a collection of human minds. I had been assuming the big mind is just as cognitively capable, if not infinitely moreso than an individual human mind (in the same way you are infinitely more capable than a single neuron).
